item.title: MindShare Manifesto
item.description: A call to propogate what we have all been feeling, an awakening.

item.title: Tossing Out Unwrapped Halloween Candy
item.description: How it feels after three decades of being gifted so much from life and everyone in it, to feeling somethings amiss just because everyone doesn't love me.

item.title: Rightous In Self
item.description: Let go of inhibition to sample what may be possible, then decide how much effort your willing to put into your faith.

item.title: Self Propagate
item.description: Let go of inhibition to sample what may be possible, then decide how much effort your willing to put into your faith.
